definition: to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Shi Xiaojing's version is faithful to the revised edition of Lao She's novel.
sentences.chinese: 施曉菁的譯本忠實地對老舍的增訂本進行了翻譯。
